articles.description: For 12-year-old Dmytro Keda, after the worst few weeks imaginable, Thursday evening was a dream come true.
articles.content:
(CNN)For 12-year-old Dmytro Keda, after the worst few weeks imaginable, Thursday evening was a dream come true.

articles.title: We don't want to face football without the wonderful Luka Modric - Football365
articles.description: Luka Modric can do things that only Luka Modric can do. We should savour him while we still have him.
